description:
OverviewThe Cable Matters Bluetooth 4.0 USB Adapter lets you communicate wirelessly 
	with Bluetooth devices such as cell phones, PDAs, mice, keyboards etc.Features* Class 2 Bluetooth version 4.0, backwards compatible with Bluetooth 1.0, 2.0, and 
	2.1* Dual-mode Bluetooth transfer* Low-power selectable 1.2 to 3.0 VI/O* Supporting Bluetooth voice data* WLAN coexistence interface* Symbol Rate: 3 Mbps* Receiving / Sending Range: up to 20m depending on the Bluetooth deviceCompatible OSWindows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1. DoesNOTsupport Mac OSXCompatible Bluetooth DevicesCell Phone , Tablet , Speaker , Headset or Headphone , Mice and Keyboard 
(functionality varies depending on the Bluetooth device)Compatible Bluetooth ProfileHID , 24-Bit CRC , AFH , EDR , Advanced Audio Processing , AVRCP , A2DP , DUN-GW, HSP , HFP A2DP AVTCP , FTP, OPP, Audio-GW, FAX, BPPPackage Content* Bluetooth 4.0 Adapter* Driver CDImportant NotePlease make sure the 
Bluetooth adapter is plugged in before installing the driver
title: Cable Matters Gold Plated Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy USB Adapter for Windows 8.1/8/7/Vista/XP in Black
